kalao.rtc package¶

Submodules¶

kalao.rtc.device_status module¶

device_status.py is part of the KalAO Instrument Control Software (KalAO-ICS).

kalao.rtc.device_status.database_update()¶
kalao.rtc.device_status.read_all()¶

kalao.rtc.gpu_control module¶

gpu_control.py is part of the KalAO Instrument Control Software (KalAO-ICS).

kalao.rtc.gpu_control.full_status_parse()¶

Reads the status of the nvidia GPU using the nvidia-smi command and returns it as a dictionary

Returns:

status_dict a dictionary contining all the gpu status values

kalao.rtc.gpu_control.status()¶

Reads the status of the nvidia GPU using the nvidia-smi command with csv output and returns it as a dictionary

Returns:

status_dict a dictionary contining all the gpu status values

kalao.rtc.gpu_control.status_parse()¶

Module contents¶

__init__.py is part of the KalAO Instrument Control Software (KalAO-ICS).
